original_text: Saul and his servant went up towards the town. When they arrived there, Samuel came towards them. He was going up to the altar on the hill.
korean_text: 그들이 성읍으로 올라가서 그리로 들어갈 때에 사무엘이 마침 산당으로 올라가려고 마주 나오더라

sentences.original_text: Saul and his servant went up towards the town
sentences.korean_translation: 사울과 그의 종은 마을을 향해 올라갔습니다

sentences.original_text: He was going up to the altar
